name: Shadow Escaper 🐱‍👤 [Quick Jam]
description:
Shadow Escaper 🐱‍👤[Quick Jam]

(sorry for my english)

📕 GOAL 📕

You're only goal is to esapce.

📘 ABOUT 📘

This game was made for the 1st Quick Jam. She's supposed to last 3 day but cause I am dum, I made my game in only one. He's really glitchy and have a lot of issues, but the most important is that I finished it in time (at 1 AM 😓)  and that you, player, enjoy him. Don't expect to much from this "game" but hope you get a little bit of fun playing it and go check the other games of the jam :)

Bye
